title: Kusursuz KiracÄ±
overview: Mona is a young woman who grew up in an orphanage. She works for the Internet newspaper and has been reporting on the cases of house arson in different parts of Istanbul recently. One day when she goes to the news of the fire, they come across the photo reporter Yakup. Returning from the news, Mona sees that the owner of the house, with whom she is already in a fight, has put her belongings in front of the door and is now homeless. Since her friend from the orphanage and now a police officer, Leyla, is on a secret mission, she has to accept as a temporary solution the offer of her new acquaintance Yakup to become a tenant in her house. However, on the first day that Mona moves into the apartment, she realizes that strange things are going on in the Yuva Apartment.
